plot outline: This is a story of Dr Animesh who is a renowned doctor and married to Nita, they have a son. Trouble starts when Dr. Animesh Starts to focus in his job and creates a distance from his wife. Nita feels lonely and falls for Jayanta, free loving spirit. Subsequently they are divorced. Trouble starts when Jayanta is half dead in an accident and lands on the operating table under Dr. Animesh. The story evolves when Nita begs Dr. Animesh for Jayanta's life and a whole lot of emotional turmoil takes place.
title: Je Jon Thake Majhkhane
